Package community.leaf.textchain.adventure

Class WrappedTextComponentBuilder

java.lang.Object
community.leaf.textchain.adventure.WrappedTextComponentBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentLike
public class WrappedTextComponentBuilder extends Object implements ComponentLike
Contains text component builders for modification and eventual component generation and caching.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WrappedTextComponentBuilder​(TextComponent.Builder builder)
    Wraps an existing Adventure text component builder.

      public TextComponent.Builder getComponentBuilder()

      the internal text component builder

    • asComponent

      public TextComponent asComponent()
      Generates or gets the cached component resulting from aggregating all internal builders.
      Specified by:
      asComponent in interface ComponentLike
      Returns:
      the aggregate built component
      See Also:
      aggregateThenRebuildComponent()

    • aggregateThenRebuildComponent

      public TextComponent aggregateThenRebuildComponent()
      Generate a new component by cloning and appending all child builders.

      Note: this method will always rebuild the component and all of its children, and invalidate all associated cached results.

      Returns:
      an aggregate built component

    • createNextChildWithBuilder

      public WrappedTextComponentBuilder createNextChildWithBuilder​(TextComponent.Builder builder)
      Creates a new child wrapper containing the provided text component builder and returns it.

      Note: this method will invalidate existing cached results since the builder's state will mutate upon calling this.

      Parameters:
      builder - the child's internal builder
      Returns:
      a new child containing the provided builder

    • createNextChild

      public WrappedTextComponentBuilder createNextChild()
      Creates a new child wrapper containing a new empty text component builder and returns it.

      Note: this method will invalidate existing cached results since the builder's state will mutate upon calling this.

      Returns:
      a new child

    • peekOrCreateChild

      public WrappedTextComponentBuilder peekOrCreateChild()
      Gets the latest child or creates one if none exist and returns it.

      Note: this method will invalidate existing cached results since the builder's state will mutate upon calling this.

      Returns:
      the latest child

    • peekThenApply

      public void peekThenApply​(Consumer<TextComponent.Builder> action)
      Gets the latest child or creates one if none exist then performs the provided action on its internal text component builder.

      Note: this method will invalidate existing cached results since the builder's state will mutate upon calling this.

      Parameters:
      action - the action to perform on the child's internal builder
